description:
The props of the [Modal](/api/modal/) component are available
when `variant="temporary"` is set.
propAnchor: Side from which the drawer will appear.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propOnClose: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.
propTransitionDuration:
The duration for the transition, in milliseconds.
You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesDocked: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="permanent or persistent"`.
stylesPaperAnchorLeft: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="left"`.
stylesPaperAnchorRight: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="right"`.
stylesPaperAnchorTop: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="top"`.
stylesPaperAnchorBottom: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="bottom"`.
stylesPaperAnchorDockedLeft: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="left"` and `variant` is not "temporary".
stylesPaperAnchorDockedTop: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="top"` and `variant` is not "temporary".
stylesPaperAnchorDockedRight: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="right"` and `variant` is not "temporary".
stylesPaperAnchorDockedBottom: Styles applied to the `Paper` component if `anchor="bottom"` and `variant` is not "temporary".
